com.novartis.opensource.yada

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.Service

  • public class Service
extends Object
    Utility class handling process of execution of stored queries, and formatting of results via http requests.
    Author:
    David Varon

    • Method Detail

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                 String parameterString)
                   throws YADARequestException
        Called by yada.jsp when using path-style parameters, this method parses the url path into a map, stores the request, and then calls handleRequest(String, Map)
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request object handed off from the servlet container
        parameterString - the resource path from the url
        Throws:
        YADARequestException - when there is an issue setting parameters in the configuration

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                   throws YADARequestException
        Stores the request in the YADARequest object and calls handleRequest(String, Map).
        Parameters:
        request - the servlet request created by the servlet container
        Throws:
        YADARequestException - when a request parameter is malformed
        Since:
        0.4.0.0

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(String referer,
                 Map<String,String[]> paraMap)
                   throws YADARequestException
        The meaty method for parsing the request parameters into YADARequest.
        Parameters:
        referer - the url of the referring page
        paraMap - the parameter map provided by the servlet request
        Throws:
        YADARequestException - when a request parameter is malformed

      • error

        private String error(String msg,
           Exception e)
        Wraps exceptions and request metadata in json in order to provide useful information to requesting clients in the event and uncaught exception bubbles up to execute()
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to report to the client
        e - the exception to report to the client
        Returns:
        a json string with error and request information

      • execute

        public String execute()
        Executes the appropriate method (select, update, or upload) per the "method" request parameter.
        Returns:
        String containing the result of execution. This could be a string of data, a record count, a url, etc.

      • _execute

        private String _execute()
                 throws YADAPluginException,
                        YADAAdaptorException,
                        YADAAdaptorExecutionException,
                        YADAConnectionException,
                        YADAConverterException,
                        YADAResponseException,
                        YADARequestException,
                        YADAResourceException,
                        YADAIOException
        Internal request processor for "get" or "update" requests (i.e., non-uploads.)
        Returns:
        the result to return to the requesting client
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when a plugin fails to execute successfully
        YADAAdaptorException - when adaptor instantion or query building fails
        YADAAdaptorExecutionException - when query execution fails
        YADAConnectionException - when the commit fails
        YADAConverterException - when the Converter implementation encounters an error or can't be instantiated by the Response
        YADAResponseException - when the Response implementation fails to execute successfully
        YADARequestException - when the class refrenced by the response parameter can't be instantiated or found, and the default instantiation fails.
        YADAIOException - when exporting results fails
        YADAResourceException - when exported results can't be written to the file system

      • exportResult

        private String exportResult(String result)
                     throws YADAResourceException,
                            YADAIOException
        Parameters:
        result - the composed and possibly post-processed result string
        Returns:
        either the original result String when YADARequest.getExport() is false or the URL of the exported file when true
        Throws:
        YADAResourceException - when FileUtils can't create directories for output on the file system
        YADAIOException - when the exported output can't be written to the file system or other file writing resource causes a problem

      • executeUpload

        private String executeUpload()
                      throws YADAPluginException,
                             YADAExecutionException
        Obtains list of FileItem from YADARequest.getUploadItems(), extracts item metadata and wraps it in json
        Returns:
        a json string containing pertinent metadata about the upload, including where to get it from the file system
        Throws:
        YADAPluginException - when plugin execution fails
        YADAExecutionException - when the upload result configuration fails
        See Also:
        YADARequest.getUploadItems()

      • getDefaultResponse

        private Response getDefaultResponse(String format)
                             throws YADARequestException
        Determines the appropriate Response class from format and instantiates it
        Parameters:
        format - the value of the format or f parameter
        Returns:
        a Response implementation
        Throws:
        YADARequestException - when the default response, based on format or f parameter value cannot be instantiated, accessed, or found.

      • composeResponse

        private String composeResponse()
                        throws YADARequestException,
                               YADAResponseException,
                               YADAConverterException
        Insantiates the response class and initiates result composition.
        Returns:
        String containing the formatted response.
        Throws:
        YADAConverterException - when the Converter implementation encounters an error or can't be instantiated by the Response
        YADAResponseException - when the Response implementation fails to execute successfully
        YADARequestException - when the class refrenced by the response parameter can't be instantiated or found, and the default instantiation fails.
        Since:
        0.4.0.0

      • setYADAQueryResults

        private void setYADAQueryResults(int size)
        Builds an array of result objects obtained from queries indexed by qMgr
        Parameters:
        size - the length of the result array

                          throws YADAPluginException
        Executes a request-level post-processor plugin
        Parameters:
